body: This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/224)

comment_regular_data.body:
Review status: 0 of 1 files reviewed at latest revision, 1 unresolved discussion, some commit checks broke.

---

_[toxcore/DHT.c, line 1227 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/224#-KVMQlMg6AHquIRozHm9:-KVMQlMg6AHquIRozHmA:b-y843di) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/7ddf542fe7eb858c1adfc000e7520ec677f6fef4/toxcore/DHT.c#L1227)):_

> ``` C
> 
>     size_t len = DHT_create_packet(dht->self_public_key, shared_key, NET_PACKET_GET_NODES, plain, sizeof(plain), data);
>     if (len == -1) {
> ```

`size_t` can not be negative.

---

_Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/224)_

<!-- Sent from Reviewable.io -->

Review status: 0 of 1 files reviewed at latest revision, 3 unresolved discussions, some commit checks broke.

---

_[toxcore/DHT.c, line 292 at r2](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/224#-KVQVdu_fCEthid3pqCj:-KVQVdu_fCEthid3pqCk:bhm8wsj) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/23c241ed328060bddf975d27969cf47c0676b195/toxcore/DHT.c#L292)):_

> ``` C
> 
> static int DHT_create_packet(const uint8_t public_key[crypto_box_PUBLICKEYBYTES],
>                              const uint8_t *shared_key, const uint8_t type, uint8_t *plain, size_t length, uint8_t *packet){
> ```

Run other/astyle/format-source.

---

_[toxcore/DHT.c, line 1226 at r2](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/224#-KVQVTPFj2NMCwsfObEh:-KVQVTPFj2NMCwsfObEi:b-r2hg6r) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/23c241ed328060bddf975d27969cf47c0676b195/toxcore/DHT.c#L1226)):_

> ``` C
>     DHT_get_shared_key_sent(dht, shared_key, public_key);
> 
>     ssize_t len = DHT_create_packet(dht->self_public_key, shared_key, NET_PACKET_GET_NODES, plain, sizeof(plain), data);
> ```

`DHT_create_packet` returns `int`. Unless you have a very good reason for an implicit conversion here, please use consistent types.

---

_[toxcore/DHT.c, line 311 at r2](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/224#-KVUnVhrMW9pOC5rXUaN:-KVUnVhtfF6MbGcoQ7GY:bz4ecwu) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/23c241ed328060bddf975d27969cf47c0676b195/toxcore/DHT.c#L311)):_

> ``` C
>     memcpy(packet + 1, public_key, crypto_box_PUBLICKEYBYTES);
>     memcpy(packet + 1 + crypto_box_PUBLICKEYBYTES, nonce, crypto_box_NONCEBYTES);
>     memcpy(packet + 1 + crypto_box_PUBLICKEYBYTES + crypto_box_NONCEBYTES, encrypt, length);
> ```

Is the MAC being discarded intentionally here?

> No, @endoffile78 you're returning the wrong `length` var. the original uses `len`, ( the result of encrypt_data_symmetric() ) , you're using length, which is the clear text length. --- _[toxcore/DHT.c, line 298 at r3](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/224#-KVYi7X-TsijvOiGk1gk:-KVYi7X-TsijvOiGk1gl:bpmr8kv) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/bb4a4d58743371e552a64ebe6cd6c1538edf9448/toxcore/DHT.c#L298)):_ > ``` C > new_nonce(nonce); > > int len = encrypt_data_symmetric(shared_key, > ``` this can all be one line. --- _[toxcore/DHT.c, line 313 at r3](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/224#-KVYm0em7bmU9aEuFTM9:-KVYm0ennH9a-5WrX-M8:bp1bcy6) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/bb4a4d58743371e552a64ebe6cd6c1538edf9448/toxcore/DHT.c#L313)):_ > ``` C > memcpy(packet + 1 + crypto_box_PUBLICKEYBYTES + crypto_box_NONCEBYTES, encrypt, length); > > return 1 + crypto_box_MACBYTES + crypto_box_NONCEBYTES + length; > ``` This needs to be `len`, not `length` --- _Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/224)_

_[auto_tests/dht_test.c, line 662 at r4](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/224#-KVlmDt_y0EdB6pkX3oB:-KVlmDtaiqRHInc5Fl9U:bi9imgp) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/579e13a7550c97444a575580e56a8cca1b5946e6/auto_tests/dht_test.c#L662)):_

> ``` C
>     ck_assert_msg(pkt[0] == NET_PACKET_GET_NODES, "Malformed packet.");
>     ck_assert_msg(length != sizeof(pkt), "Invalid size. Should be %d got %d", sizeof(pkt), length);
>     ck_assert_msg(memcmp(pkt + 1, key, crypto_box_KEYBYTES) == 0, "Malformed packet.");
> ```

You're comparing the key to the nonce, this should fail. Don't fix it until Travis finished please

Review status: 0 of 2 files reviewed at latest revision, 7 unresolved discussions, some commit checks failed.

---

_[toxcore/DHT.c, line 379 at r7](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/224#-KVtvizQ2ThOgdb3ffjD:-KVtvizRC2F7kfHAOZF1:b-lqas0c) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/9f5ec36233661b5c658e2ed4475d0743e166cfe0/toxcore/DHT.c#L379)):_

> ``` C
>     new_nonce(nonce);
> 
>     int len = encrypt_data_symmetric(shared_key, nonce,
> ```

Can you rename this? Now we have a `len` and a `length`, so it's easy to mix them up. What is this the length of? Name it according to that. Perhaps `encrypted_length`, and rename `encrypt` to `encrypted`, since `encrypt` is a verb, which makes it look like a function when it's not. You could also rename `length` to `plain_length` for consistency and clarity.

---

_[toxcore/DHT.c, line 1309 at r7](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/224#-KVtwXOtOX2gFnqkrzD_:-KVtwXOtOX2gFnqkrzDa:b-9zs8sg) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/9f5ec36233661b5c658e2ed4475d0743e166cfe0/toxcore/DHT.c#L1309)):_

> ``` C
>         return -1;
>     }
>     return sendpacket(dht->net, ip_port, data, len);
> ```

Is `len` not equal to `sizeof data` here? Please add an `assert` above this line expressing the relationship between the two.

---

_[toxcore/DHT.c, line 1211 at r10](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/224#-KVve1XFrcrLFJUvALDR:-KVve1XFrcrLFJUvALDS:b2n1lh2) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/5019a5aaf9b6e927e7b56b0f808efc01ba62d66a/toxcore/DHT.c#L1211)):_

> ``` C
>                                      encrypt);
> 
>     if (len != sizeof(encrypt)) {
> ```

Why was this check replaced with an assert?

---

_[toxcore/DHT.c, line 1266 at r10](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/224#-KVve8qX5YMYqN8xPUQG:-KVve8qX5YMYqN8xPUQH:b2n1lh2) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/5019a5aaf9b6e927e7b56b0f808efc01ba62d66a/toxcore/DHT.c#L1266)):_

> ``` C
>                                      encrypt);
> 
>     if (len != 1 + nodes_length + length + crypto_box_MACBYTES) {
> ```

Why was this check replaced with an assert?

---

_[toxcore/DHT.c, line 1269 at r10](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/224#-KVvdbYGHRIIJSf9PNtT:-KVvdbYHmog114ixCqdu:b-tzjz0i) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/59e09abe28fe3f5eb9305c30ea0867692df8c15f/toxcore/DHT.c#L1269)):_

> ``` C
>     memcpy(plain + 1 + nodes_length, sendback_data, length);
> 
>     uint8_t data[2 + crypto_box_PUBLICKEYBYTES + crypto_box_NONCEBYTES
> ```

That shouldn't be `2 +` but `1 +` and `1 +` later. The order of sizes should match the order of things being written into the array. Also, why not just use `sizeof(plain)` for `1 + nodes_length + length`?

---

> Done. --- _[toxcore/DHT.c, line 1266 at r10](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/224#-KVve8qX5YMYqN8xPUQG:-KVwtlQgqj9h2mcn9MgL:b-896fix) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/5019a5aaf9b6e927e7b56b0f808efc01ba62d66a/toxcore/DHT.c#L1266)):_
Previously, nurupo wrote… > Why was this check replaced with an assert? >
> Done. --- _[toxcore/DHT.c, line 1269 at r10](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/224#-KVvdbYGHRIIJSf9PNtT:-KVwtFkcCtAStU0uYaJX:b-kbwgqw) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/59e09abe28fe3f5eb9305c30ea0867692df8c15f/toxcore/DHT.c#L1269)):_
Previously, nurupo wrote… > That shouldn't be `2 +` but `1 +` and `1 +` later. The order of sizes should match the order of things being written into the array. Also, why not just use `sizeof(plain)` for `1 + nodes_length + length`? >
> I reorder the length, but we can't use sizeof(plain) it could potentially be bigger than we need. We only need `1 + node_length + length` but plain is`1 + Node_format_size * MAX_SENT_NODES + length`. --- _Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/224)_
replaced nurupo with @robinlinden because nurupo is away, hopefully doing something fun

verification.payload:
tree 681a95a8470afe8d4c4e891389f103d1f289f1c3
parent fe1fea82c324598baa3facf2767c5ea5bf9dc956
author endoffile78 <endoffile78@yahoo.com> 1478491310 -0600
committer endoffile78 <endoffile78@yahoo.com> 1478901184 -0600

Add DHT_create_packet

labels.description: New feature for the user, not a new feature for build script
labels.name: enhancement

title: Add DHT_create_packet, an abstraction for DHT RPC packets
